Module testnofx
Package packageexplorer

Class HtmlBuilder

java.lang.Object
packageexplorer.HtmlBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
HtmlBuilderInterface
public class HtmlBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements HtmlBuilderInterface
This class builds and writes files (html, css) and creates required folder structure required to run the web pages. Uses Package class as data structure
Author:
Paavo Mattila

      private boolean checkIfDependancyIsPackage​(java.lang.String dependancy)

      Parameters:
      dependancy - is the dependancy to be checked
      Returns:
      true if there is a package in the packagelist with the same name as dependancy

    • buildIndexPage

      private void buildIndexPage()
      This method generates an index.html page with a list of packages and links to them. The method collects package names, sorts them and forms an ordered list out of them

    • loadDefaultCss

      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> loadDefaultCss()
      This method reads defaultStyle.css and adds the lines it contains to htmCodelines LinkedList. defaultStyle.css is located in the root folder of the project.
      Returns:
      a LinkedList with Strings containing code lines

    • isOperatingSystemDebian

      public boolean isOperatingSystemDebian()
      This method checks if the user is using a Debian based OS. This is required, because folder path information has different syntax
      Specified by:
      isOperatingSystemDebian in interface HtmlBuilderInterface
      Returns:
      true if current operating system is debian. The address starts with / instead of C:\etc
